text: Sami Mavinga (born 25 March 1993) is a French rugby union player for Newcastle Falcons in England's Premiership Rugby, the top tier. Mavinga is a prop and has previously played for Lyon OU in France's Pro D2 and Top 14. ==Career== Mavinga joined LOU as a 13 year old and played for them in Pro D2 as well as the European Rugby Challenge Cup. On 27 March 2017, Mavinga's signing was announced by Newcastle Falcons in England. After two impressive seasons in England, Mavinga returned to France signing a contract with Stade Français in Paris. ==References== Category:French rugby union players Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Newcastle Falcons rugby players Category:Lyon OU players Category:Rugby union props Category:French expatriates in England
title: Sami Mavinga
